title: PluginAction
content:

name: PluginAction
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: ''
description: |
  PluginAction represents a generic performable action in Studio with no
  directly‑associated Class.PluginToolbarButton. If
  Class.PluginAction.AllowBinding|AllowBinding is true, the action can be
  assigned a keyboard shortcut through Studio's File ⟩ Customize
  Shortcuts window.

  A PluginAction must be created using the Class.Plugin:CreatePluginAction()
  method in order to work as expected.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotReplicated
deprecationmessage: ''

  - name: PluginAction.ActionId
    summary: |
      A string that uniquely identifies this action.
    description: |
      A string that uniquely identifies this action. This string is the key used
      when saving and loading the action's state in Roblox Studio.
    codesamples: []
    type: string
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: false
    capabilities: []
  - name: PluginAction.AllowBinding
    summary: |
      Determines whether the action can be assigned a keyboard shortcut in
      Studio.
    description: |
      This property determines whether the action can be assigned a keyboard
      shortcut through Studio's File ⟩ Customize Shortcuts window.
      Default is true.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags:
      - ReadOnly

    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None

    threadsafety: ReadSafe

    capabilities: []

    description: |

    codesamples: []
    type: string
    tags:

      canload: false

    capabilities: []

    summary: |
      The text that is displayed when viewing this action in Roblox Studio.
